128621.name: BF4 Clean Chocolate Theme
128621.desc: Simple Design that removes all the nasty glow stuff from BF4 Battlelog and add some sweetness to it.

128800.name: Battlelog 2.0 Theme
128800.desc: A theme which is really unlike any other.

128805.name: White Shadow Theme
128805.desc: A nice looking clean white theme for BF4 Battlelog

128809.name: Vintage Theme: № 1
128809.desc: A theme for BF3 in vintage style.

128847.name: [BF4] Battlefield Hardline Theme
128847.desc: Theme in the style of Battlelog for Battlefield Hardline made especially for fans of the game.

129102.name: Steam Theme
129102.desc: The idea behind the Steam Theme, is to make Battlelog look and feel more like Steam does. This theme is retired, originally made by xXJumpyXx and still look awesome.

133602.name: [BF4] Battlefield Hardline Old Theme
133602.desc: If you like old Hardline theme

134230.name: [BFH] Dark theme
134230.desc: It's old, perfect dark-looking theme from old BFH BL design!

135961.name: Hardfine Theme
135961.desc: Flat, new, modern looking theme in great grey and orange tones

136066.name: BFH Clean Chocolate Theme
136066.desc: Warm design with straight colors. Just for some eye-candy polishing.

139019.name: White theme
139019.desc: Nice white-looking theme for BF3 Battlelog

139609.name: Night Theme
139609.desc: Nice, lite and night transparent theme for the BF4 Battlelog. Fast loading, no bugs including, regular updates

info.creator: IIDOGHUNTERII
info.feedback-topic: [BF4] X-RAY Dark Glass Theme by jpfive

150023.name: X-Ray Dark Glass Theme v1.2.1
150023.desc: A flat, dark glass battlelog theme with a modern design and clean visual interface.

126646.name: Battlelog Mods
126646.desc: A plugin that give some love to battlelog mods. It add text templates to make forum posts easier. It add new menu entries into user profile triangle.

126663.name: Show Map Rotation
126663.desc: This addon shows each servers' map rotation as small map icons on the server bowser.

126667.name: Completed Assignments
126667.desc: This addon hides/shows your completed assignments by clicking one button. It also colors red your locked assignments.

126690.name: General Enhancements
126690.desc: This plugin adds small features to many areas of Battlelog. All of the ideas were submitted by GeneralHastati, thanks! More details are available in the forum thread.

126691.name: Show by DLC
126691.desc: This plugin adds buttons to show only assignments/weapons/awards/weapon unlocks from specific DLC/base game.

126692.name: Missions Screen Enhancer
126692.desc:
This plugin enhances the Missions screen. More details are available in the forum thread.

Based on this request: http://getbblog.com/board/topic/111865/1/Request-Improved-Missions-tab

126693.name: Platoon Dropdown
126693.desc: This plugin adds a submenu to the Platoons item in the header and you can add your platoons to the menu.

126694.name: Hide Forum
126694.desc:
This plugin hides all traces of the forums.

Based on this request: http://getbblog.com/board/topic/1484/1/Option-to-hide-the-forum

126695.name: To Top in Loadout
126695.desc:
This plugin adds a To Top button to the Loadout page of the BF3 Battlelog.

Original 2.x plugin by encryptedband: http://getbblog.com/board/topic/1953/1/To-top-button-in-Loadout-request#post-5225

126727.name: Has PBBans
126727.desc:
This plug in will help you find a server with "PBBans", "GCC-Stream" or "Anticheat Inc" active, in order to play fair with no hackers to disturb you.
By adding 3 icons (each for every service) on the server browser and on the server info page, it provide a fast way to know if the server is streaming on any of these 3 services.

132336.name: Progressbar To Rank 140
132336.desc: Shows a progressbar right under the stats page, telling you how many points the player achieved. 100% = Rank 140, time is calculated by the current spm

133899.name: Additional Enhancements
133899.desc: Removes various elements from BattleLog. Currently removes 'Buy Battlepacks', Tiles, Buy Hardline Ad & Right Sidebar in the landing page. Also added by Sil3ntStorm: Removes the Com Center &  removes the Cookie Preferences bar / button.

137332.name: Auto Expand Battlescreen
137332.desc:
This plugin automatically expands Battlescreen to fullscreen.

Based on this request: http://getbblog.com/board/topic/119085/1/REQUEST-Auto-Expand-Battlescreen

137420.name: BFH weapon unlock feeds remover
137420.desc:
This plugin hides all weapon unlock messages of Battlefiled Hardline ( "[your friend name] purchased [unlocked weapon name]" ) from your battle feed.

Note: It does not support any unlock messages of Battlefiled Hardline BETA.

137519.name: Second Assault Map Names Correction
137519.desc:
This plugin removes 2014 from the names of Second Assault maps.

Based on this request: http://getbblog.com/board/topic/115125/1/Second-Assault-Server-Browser-Correction

137542.name: Move BBLog Button
137542.desc:
This plugin allows you to set the distance of the BBLog button from the top of the page.

Based on this request: http://getbblog.com/board/topic/116010/1/General-Question

138606.name: Add Twitter Feed
138606.desc:
This plugin adds a Twitter feed of @Battlefield to the Battlelog homepage.

Based on this request: http://getbblog.com/board/topic/126517/1/Add-Battlefield-Twitter-feed-to-Battlelog

138648.name: Disable Dropdowns
138648.desc:
This plugin disables the dropdowns in the main menu.

Based on this request: http://getbblog.com/board/topic/108614/1/Ability-to-disable-the-Soldier-Multiplayer-dropdowns

138664.name: French Spelling Correction
138664.desc:
This plugin fixes some errors in the french translation of Battlelog.

Based on a request sent to me by an email.

139627.name: Custom Teamspeak
139627.desc: Lets You set a custom Teamspeak Server in Better Battlelog

141066.name: BL Some Improvements/Removes
141066.desc: The plugin add some functions, for ex., you can hide the ComCenter, and it just remove and fix some things. The idea belongs to the user I-Billy-Bonka-I, and I liked it immediately

142219.name: Like2Hooah
142219.desc:
German
==================
ersetzt den 'Like' Button mit einem 'Hooah' Button

Englisch
==================
replaces the 'Like' button with a 'Hooah' button

142801.name: Scoreboard+
142801.desc: This plugin adds the average rank and score, for each team on the selected server, to the scoreboard in the serverbrowser.

145580.name: Preset Updater
145580.desc: Allows updating and renaming of BF4 Weapon Presets without deleting them first.

info.creator: Lexo91
info.feedback-topic: [BF4] Keyboard Navigation in Assignment list and Dogtag list

147502.name: BF4 Live-Scoreboard Sorter
147502.desc: Normally the scoreboard is sorted descending by the score. But as an admin (even as a normal player) it's sometimes easier sorting a table by your own needs. And this plugin will do excatly this for you :)

147537.name: BF4 Battlereport Prizes Fixer
147537.desc: Since the latest patch all battlereports containing the "Elite Squad" prize there is a little bug with the alignment of the prizes. This plugin will correct the positioning of the "Elite Squad" prize in the battlereport.

147544.name: Comcenter Remover
147544.desc: Some people are not using the comcenter (chat and friendlist), so the comcenter takes a lot of space which could be removed. This plugin will remove the comcenter and repositioning the whole website for you.

147658.name: BF4 Advanced Player Links
147658.desc: Admins want to check player if they are hacking or not. For this they often use third-party software/websites which check there stats and other things. This plugin will add some known websites to all player profiles. Click them and you will be redirected to this website :)

147809.name: Update page
147809.desc: Simply plugin just add block to update current BL page by ajax, it is not need to reload page anymore

147823.name: Categorized Favorites
147823.desc: This plugin gives you the ability to create categories for you server favorites.

147931.name: Friends Highlighter
147931.desc: Highlights your friends in the scoreboard and battlereports

148492.name: Embedded Vimeo Videos
148492.desc:
This plugin replaces Vimeo links with embedded videos.

Based on this request: https://getbblog.com/board/topic/139752/1/Embed-vimeo-link-just-like-youtube-links
